name: 2048 Bricks Shoot - Android game
description:
It's simple 2048 template game.

How to play?
Drop the bricks down and merge similar numbers to get 2048 and higher tiles.

FEATURES:
• Free to play.
• One finger control.
• A simple game for every type of player.
• Hyper Casual Game.
• Addictive and endless fun game-play.
• Compete for the best score in the world.
• Blue, dark and classic themes.
• Shoot and merge.
